mapper.select: SELECT playlists.p_list_id, playlists.p_list_name, albums.album_image FROM users JOIN playlists ON users.id = playlists.id LEFT JOIN playlist_songs ON playlists.p_list_id = playlist_songs.p_list_id LEFT JOIN songs ON playlist_songs.song_id = songs.song_id LEFT JOIN albums ON songs.album_id = albums.album_id WHERE users.id = #{id} AND ( playlist_songs.created_time IS NULL OR playlist_songs.created_time = ( SELECT MAX(ps2.created_time) FROM playlist_songs ps2 WHERE ps2.p_list_id = playlists.p_list_id ) ) ORDER BY playlists.p_list_id

SELECT pl.p_list_id, pl.p_list_name, ps.song_id, ps.created_time, s.title, si.singer_name, a.album_image FROM playlists pl JOIN playlist_songs ps ON pl.p_list_id = ps.p_list_id JOIN songs s ON ps.song_id = s.song_id JOIN singers si ON s.song_id = si.song_id JOIN albums a ON s.album_id = a.album_id WHERE pl.p_list_id = #{pListId} ORDER BY ps.created_time DESC
SELECT p_list_id, p_list_name FROM playlists WHERE p_list_id = #{pListId}
mapper.update: update playlists set p_list_name = #{pListName} where p_list_id = #{pListId}
